full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYAD MA 'BUM BZLOG PA'I BSRUNG 'KHOR BRIS TSUL PHAN YON DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B CES BYAD MA 'BUM BZLOG PA'I BSRUNG @013A *, ,'KHOR BYA TSUL 'DI NI, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRI D'I PAm KAR RA SHRI DZNY'A NAS MDZAD CING, BOD KYI LOTZTSA BA BYAMS PA SHES RAB KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAGS SO, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PA MANG PO LA BRGYUD NAS BDAG LA TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG PO LA'O, SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
author_simple: SHRI D'I PAm KAR RA SHRI DZNY'A NA,
